description: Try our easy to follow Lime & Ginger Beef Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle salad,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free,Father's Day
name: Lime & Ginger Beef Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: fried shallots, coarsely chopped roasted peanuts and red chilli, optional, to serve (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing, halve limes and reserve one half. Juice remaining lime halves and place into a screw-top jar. Add remaining ingredients, seal and shake to combine well.
Place beef into a bowl, add 2 tbs dressing, stir to coat and set aside to marinate for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook noodles as per packet instructions. Rinse in cold water and drain.

Heat 2 tsp oil in a wok over very high heat. Cook half the steak, tossing for 1-2 minutes or until golden brown. Transfer to a plate and repeat with remaining oil and steak. Set aside to rest for 5 minutes.

Place noodles in a serving bowl, top with onion, herbs, sprouts, cabbage, snow peas and steak. Spoon over dressing, scatter with shallots, peanuts and chilli, if using. Serve with reserved lime cut into wedges.
